exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "L (S n)" in the current goal.

original: intros Hcumulative Hge. induction Hge. - exists nil. simpl. rewrite app_nil_r. reflexivity. - destruct IHHge as [A HA]. destruct (Hcumulative n) as [B HB]. exists (A ++ B). rewrite HB. rewrite app_assoc. congruence.
